overview: Rima Patel is responsible for marketing & sales management at MobileSphere. Rima oversees MobileSphere’s marketing, promotional and sales initiatives, with particular focus in University and Consumer markets. Rima has held marketing & sales positions at companies such as Omni Hotels, Circles and Student Advantage and brings a wealth of experience to MobileSphere in the areas of marketing, promotions, sales and account management. Rima received a bachelor’s degree in Psychology and Political Science from Indiana State University.
